author: markt
msg: Remove deprecation from code associated with handling abandoned connections. The issue that cause this code to be deprecated (returning connections to the pool) has been fixed by closing the abandoned connection and not returning it to the pool.

author: jukka
msg: PDFBOX-437: Prepare JempBox and FontBox for release
The release fails if .NET dlls can not be built, so for now I've just disabled that part and we're just building (and testing) the jar by default.

author: davsclaus
msg: Added jms-http with TX example using Spring Testing.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-1768 : Removed all the special priority queue code. Added the ability for a FlowableBaseQueueEntryList to delegate its accounting to a parent QueueEntryList. This results in the PriorityQueueEntryList using the same FtD algorithm as SimpleQELs.

- New Messages on a flowed queue are pushed optimistically pushed to disk, this should potentially be removed and just rely on the purger to flush the correct message which in the Priority case may not be the last message in.
- When space is available messages are loaded in queue order, so in this case Priority order.
